ygData.subject: RE: Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re right there are no gloves or boots (that i m aware of) among a few other pieces, I m referring to tunic arms legs (you could include bracers, but I
ygData.messageBody:
>just curious what you mean by full mithril. i've never seen boots or
>gloves. and notwithstanding my druid friend's daily jokes about me peeing
>my pants, the stats are just too good on imbrued and mithril upper body and
>imbured lower body still looks pretty damn good. now if i could only find
>the bathroom when i need to go.
>
>Shada D'ukal, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
>Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
>Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
>Manda, Level 11 Wood Elf Warrior
>Mithaniel Marr Server

You're right there are no gloves or boots (that i'm aware of) among a few
other pieces, I'm referring to tunic arms legs (you could include bracers,
but I don't wear those).
I think i will probable go with imbrued armor once I get all the pieces I
want. I have gloves but the WIS bonus doesn't make sense to me on them (yay,
i went from a 60 WIS to 65 *boggles*).

Sart
